Application One Application Two

Single Spa Unmounting parcel error

  1. Launch App One and incorporate a parcel by selecting the corresponding button within the application.
  2. Engage the button on the parcel's UI to initiate its disengagement, followed by a switch to App 2. This mirrors a single-spa parcel exhibited in a modal format. Closing the modal triggers the unmount function in the single-spa react framework and prompts a navigation change in the app's logic.
  3. Pay attention to any anomalies when unmounting the parcel, especially if it indicates that the parcel is already in the process of unmounting.
